```{r, include = F}

t7 = make_tables(t7_formulas, estimation_technique = "prais",
            min_year = 1909,
            max_year = 2006)
```

```{r}
years = (0:750)/10
registrations = exp(5.452 *log(years) - 0.635 *log(years)^2)
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data.frame(years, registrations),
       aes(x = years, y = registrations))+
    geom_line()

```
